text: :Not to be confused with Motherland (anthem). "Motherland" (; pronunciation: ) is the national anthem of Sicily. This song was made by a pop singer named Vincenzo Spampinato, after it was chosen in a competition. It became the region's national anthem in 2003.La Regione siciliana ha il proprio inno, Madreterra. La Sicilia è la prima fra tutte le Regioni ad averlo (2003-06-13). L'Ora Siciliana.Un cantautore catanese per l'inno della Regione (2003-04-20). Bonanno, lberto; Nobile, Laura. la Repubblica. It was played for the first time in front of a bunch of people at an old theatre on 14 June 2003, by the Sicilian Symphony Orchestra and the Musa 2000 Choir.Taormina, esordisce l'Inno siciliano (2003-06-15). la Repubblica.In piedi, si canta Fratelli di Sicilia (2003-06-13).
